programme.medium_synopsis: Michael Parkinson's castaway is equestrian Virginia Holgate.
programme.long_synopsis:
Virginia Holgate has won two medals in the Olympic Games as a horse trials rider. In conversation with Michael Parkinson, she recalls her childhood travels round the world with her father who was in the Royal Marines, and talks about her career which nearly ended with a disastrous fall.
